title: Spicing up the world of embedded finance, lemon.markets rakes in €15 million to facilitate brokerage services across Europe - Tech.eu
content: Spicing up the world of embedded finance, lemon.markets rakes in €15 million to facilitate brokerage services across Europe  Tech.eu
description: The neo-brokerage firm will use the funding to accelerate its product development, extending its usage to businesses that wish to integrate stock trading into their services
